description: Understand the history and evolution of the Java programming language
Identify key features and principles of Java, such as object-oriented programming and platform independence
Explore popular applications and industries using Java, including Android app development, web development, and enterprise software
Document major libraries and frameworks used in Java development, such as Spring, Hibernate, and Apache Commons
Research the Java ecosystem, including the Java Community Process (JCP), Java Development Kit (JDK), and Java Virtual Machine (JVM)
